ygData.subject: RE: Sonorous Clouding still blinks :-(
ygData.msgSnippet: I can confirm that my cable modem connectivity in Austin has been terrible lately and PL/Lag is virtually unbearable.  I haven t taken the time to follow this
ygData.messageBody:
I can confirm that my cable modem connectivity in Austin has been terrible
lately and PL/Lag is virtually unbearable. I haven't taken the time to
follow this to its origin. Nothing like right clicking a vendor in North FP
while there are 11 people in the zone and having it take 5 seconds to
download the list of wares - apply that scenario to everything you do that
interacts with the server and you get the idea.

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:elijah@...]
> Sent: Thursday, September 16, 1999 4:28 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Sonorous Clouding still blinks :-(
>
>
> From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>
>
>
> >That's possible. I didn't check the lag meter, but I've been
> >coping with 10%-30% PL most of the time for the last three
> >weeks.
>
>
> It's been BAD! Wave after wave of linkdeads, and it is
> happening to friends
> with cable modems as well as with my dial up connection. I have been
> wondering if it was regional (Austin) or further upstream.
> Sounds like trhe
> latter
>
> Tszaaz E'Taurguin
>
